entity.name: Seosam Technologies Limited
entity.description: Seosam Technologies Limited is a leading cloud and software solutions provider based in Kenya, dedicated to building digital public goods and open source innovations in healthcare, finance, and education across Africa.

projects.name: AfyaFOSS
projects.description: AfyaFOSS is an open-source electronic medical records (EMR) system designed for African clinics. It features a mobile-first interface, multilingual support, offline mode, and an AI assistant for voice-driven patient data entry. The system aims to improve patient record keeping, clinical workflows, and health data insights across low-resource settings.

channels.address: Account: 1234567890, Branch: Nairobi CBD, Bank: Equity Bank Kenya
channels.description: Preferred funding channel for project development and deployment support.

plans.name: AfyaFOSS Phase 1 Deployment
plans.description: Funding to complete development, testing, and initial deployments to 50 clinics across East Africa.

history.description: Initial bootstrapped development and PoC testing in one pilot clinic in Nairobi, Kenya.
